messages.content:
System Prompt:
You are a shipping instruction extraction expert. Your job is to extract all fields from messy CSV documents using strict header and content logic. You must always group multi-line values under their headers and return only valid JSON. Never add any extra commentary, be precise, resilient, and consistent.

Extract ALL shipping instruction data from the following CSV (semicolon delimited).
The document is A4-style format. Fields and tables may be scattered, multi-line, and not neatly organized.

Grouping logic:
For multi-line fields (“To”, “Shipper”, “Consignee”, “Notify Party”, “Hard copies sent to”):

When you find a header, collect ALL subsequent lines/rows as part of that field until the next header or table starts.

Join those lines with a \n line break character in the value.

Output one joined string per field. Never split or drop those lines.

SINGLE FIELDS:
Date, SI Ref, Sales Order, HS Code, Label size, Beetle traps, Last date of shipment, Port of Loading, Port of Discharge

LABELING TABLE:
SI NO, Case No, Type, Grade, Weights (gross/tare/net)

PRODUCTS TABLE:
Grade Mark, Crop, Packing, Packing Material, Numbering, Cartons, Net Kg/C48

VARIABLE:
Description of goods, Position on cartons, Fumigation, Shipping documents, Special instructions

Return ONLY valid JSON using this structure:
{
"date": "",
"si_ref": "",
"sales_order": "",
"to": "",
"shipper": "",
"consignee": "",
"notify_party": "",
"description_of_goods": "",
"hs_code": "",
"labeling": {
"si_no": "",
"case_no": "",
"type": "",
"grade": "",
"weights": ""
},
"label_size": "",
"position_on_cartons": "",
"fumigation": "",
"beetle_traps": "",
"last_date_of_shipment": "",
"port_of_loading": "",
"port_of_discharge": "",
"shipping_documents": "",
"hard_copies_sent_to": "",
"special_instructions": "",
"products": [
{
"grade_mark": "",
"crop": "",
"packing": "",
"packing_material": "",
"numbering": "",
"cartons": "",
"net_kg_c48": ""
}
],
"additional_info": ""
}

If a field is missing, leave it as an empty string.
Example for a multi-line field:
"to": "Company Name\nStreet\nCity - State\nZip"

CSV:

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help:
Make sure to use a publicly accessible URL.
You can test if your image is publicly accessible by opening the link in an incognito tab.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

spec.help: Map this directly from the output of a previous **Create a Completion** module. Look for `Choices[]: Message.Tool Calls[]: ID`.
spec.name: id
spec.label: Tool call ID

spec.help: The name of the function previously called.
spec.name: name
spec.label: Name

spec.help: The arguments previously output by the AI.
spec.name: arguments
spec.label: Arguments

mappable.help: You can map the entire `Choices[]: Message.Tool Calls` array from a previous Create a Completion module here.

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help: The return of the function. This role should only be used when you have processed a previous function call and want to send the output of the function execution back to the AI.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help: Map this directly from the output of a previous **Create a Completion** module. Look for `Choices[]: Message.Tool Calls[]: ID`.
nested.name: tool_call_id
nested.label: Tool Call ID.

mapper.json:
{
  "date": "2025-12-02",
  "si_ref": "SI-2030-88",
  "sales_order": "SO-77721",
  "to": "Worldwide Tobacco Inc.\n100 Export Road, Suite 5\nSanta Maria - RS - Brazil\nZip Code: 97000-123",
  "shipper": "LogiTrade Sped Ltda\nRua Central, 45\nPorto Alegre - RS - Brazil",
  "consignee": "Beijing Forwarders Co., Ltd.\n442 Capital Blvd\nBeijing, China\nZip: 100088",
  "notify_party": "NotifyPro Ltd\nAvenida Brasília, 50\nRio de Janeiro - RJ\nBrazil",
  "description_of_goods": "Cured Leaf Tobacco, Class B; Moisture ≤ 10%; Packs: Carton Box.",
  "hs_code": "2401.20.90",
  "labeling": {
    "si_no": "9",
    "case_no": "MTB-42",
    "type": "Raw",
    "grade": "Premium",
    "weights": "Gross: 85kg; Tare: 15kg; Net: 70kg"
  },
  "label_size": "40x25mm",
  "position_on_cartons": "Lower left edge",
  "fumigation": "Fumigated; Cert provided.",
  "beetle_traps": "Not required",
  "last_date_of_shipment": "2025-12-12",
  "port_of_loading": "Rio Grande",
  "port_of_discharge": "Tianjin Xingang",
  "shipping_documents": "Invoice; Packing List; BL",
  "hard_copies_sent_to": "Cargo Agents Ltd\nRua Azul, 10\nJoinville - SC\nZip: 89203-041",
  "special_instructions": "Keep away from heat.\nUrgent delivery on arrival.",
  "products": [
    {
      "grade_mark": "X9",
      "crop": "2025",
      "packing": "Carton",
      "packing_material": "Fiberboard",
      "numbering": "020-120",
      "cartons": "101",
      "net_kg_c48": "300,50"
    }
  ],
  "additional_info": "Insurance paid. BL original sent."
}
​
